title: Pink angel sponge cake
ingredients: ['Sponge', '4 oz (110g) butter', '4 oz (110g) self-raising Flour', '4 oz (110g) caster sugar', '3 eggs, beaten', 'Filling', '40g raspberry or strawberry jam', 'Icing', '1 oz (30g) butter', '3 tbsp (45ml) milk', '4 oz (110g) caster sugar', '7 oz (200g) icing sugar', '2 tbsp golden syrup', '1 tsp vanilla extract', '1 tsp red food colouring', 'Cream coating', '284ml double cream, whipped', '1 tsp red food colouring', '2 tbsp icing sugar', '150g multi-coloured hundreds and thousands']
